descript.abstract: This data set includes state licensing information maintained by the Michigan Department of Licensing and Regulatory Affairs (LARA). This data set is for licensed health care facilities and agencies. Health care facilities and agencies include freestanding surgical outpatient facilities, homes for the aged, hospitals, hospice agencies, hospice residences, nursing homes, and psychiatric hospitals/units. Data set includes the following attributes: license number, facility type code, facility name, street address, city, state, ZIP code, and county. For homes for the aged, hospitals, hospice residences, nursing homes, and psychiatric hospitals/units, total capacity is maintained. For homes psychiatric hospitals/units, serving adults and children is maintained.
descript.purpose: This data set was created to populate a mapping system maintained by the Michigan Department of Technology, Management and Budget (DTMB). The map displays for public consumption where state licensed providers are located and provides basic licensing information on these licensed providers.
